councils.name: Council of Nicaea
councils.description: The first ecumenical council that established the divinity of Christ
councils.offendedMessage: The Council of Nicaea condemns your Christological errors!

councils.name: Council of Constantinople
councils.description: Refined and expanded the Nicene Creed
councils.offendedMessage: The Council of Constantinople is appalled by your creedal innovations!

councils.name: Council of Ephesus
councils.offendedMessage: The Council of Ephesus is deeply troubled by your Marian theology!

councils.name: Council of Chalcedon
councils.description: Defined Christ's two natures (divine and human)
councils.offendedMessage: The Council of Chalcedon condemns your confusion of Christ's natures!

councils.name: Council of Trent
councils.offendedMessage: The Council of Trent anathematizes your Protestant sympathies!
